## Functionality of `pensionviewr` package
```{r }
library(reasontheme)
library(pensionviewr)
lsf.str("package:pensionviewr")
```

## Raw format (pullData())

```{r}
pl <- planList()
library(data.table)
x <- data.table(pullData(pl, "New Mexico Educational Retirement Board"))
colnames(x)
```
